title: How To Dance The Mambo : Basic Mambo Dance Moves

json.text: Hello I am Sarolta Eke and Tamas Kassay. we are here on behalf of Expert Village. We are
going to show you how to dance mambo. Now we are showing you mambo basic step the men's
step 2 and 3 4 and 5, 2 and 3 4 and 5 and the steps will look like, left foot forward
right foot in place, and close left foot to right foot. Then right foot back left foot
in place and close right foot to left foot. Once more left foot forward right foot in
place, close left foot and right foot then right foot back, left foot in place close
right foot to left foot. And the foot technique for this step is both left ball ball and then
ball flat, ball ball so you start this step up with your balls of feet. So it's ball flat
ball ball, ball flat ball ball, ball flat ball ball, ball flat ball ball. Don't forget
that you need to step on each step so that you can follow the music.
